name: Trailblade
description:
A game where the player tries to uncover the mystery surrounding the trailblade and the dungeons he finds himself stranded in...

Try to make it through the dungeons, and find the logs someone(?) left behind!

Controls: (Gamepad supported):

WASD (Left Joystick): move
Mouse (Right Joystick): Aim
Left Mouse Button (R2): Use Primary Weapon
Right Mouse Button (L2): Use Secondary Weapon
Scroll Wheel (L-R): Zoom camera
1-3 (DPad): Change Forms
Tab (Select/-): View Map
